column1: Local Foods////Nice location and place. Nice
column2: fast and friendly service. But the food and reviews are overrated. I had the salmon sandwich and it was okay. The slaw was Asian inspired and bland
column3: so was the potato salad. My husband had the roast beef and he said it was good. We spent $30 for 2 sandwiches and sides and a ice tea. Will I be back? Most likely not
column4: but it was a good experience.
